title: MHRB Assam Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Medical and Health Recruitment Board Assam (MHRB Assam) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation can apply for the MHRB Assam Jobs 2025 . The interested candidates can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection proces...
